text: I was hoping beyond all hope that the Divinity series would make it onto your list Supra, thanks! Divine Divinity, the original game is much better and easily the best in the Series thus far. There's a prequel slated for release sometime this year. I highly suggest you get your hands on the original game and give it a shit, one of my all time favorite games.

text: Nice little game in the old school PC style, kinda hard to pick up if you're not used to the mechanics and the dragon sections aren't used to their full potential but the quirky humour and excellent writing that all Divinity games have is there.

text: It's a bit weird in the beginning, but I understand where you're coming from! I do enjoy 'The Bannered Mare' from Elder Scrolls V a lot more when it comes to tavern-y songs :D
author: BlackSpeakersOhYeah

text: I haven't played this series, I heard average things about this game. The soundtrack is very cool though, this track really manages to make you feel like you're in a tavern having fun, eating and drinking until the sun rises again. Very unique sounding, it grew on me after repeated listens.
